name: Voidsinger
description:
Rundown

Voidsinger is an interactive grid-based shipbuilder focused on a unique combat system. Using your keys, you will play notes to activate your Voidsongs, which all interact with the environment and enemies... and yourself! Explore each randomly-generated level while clearing them from enemies in order to gain more pixels to build the best (or worst) ship possible.

So get out there, and play your song!

Controls

Mouse Cursor - Aim ship

Left Mouse - Use thrusters

# Buttons ('1', '2', '3', '4', and '5') - Prepare Voidsongs

Spacebar - Activate Voidsongs

'B' Button - Pull up menu to build/repair ship

'Esc' Button - Leave the game
